content: भीषण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भी-णिच्-सुक् ल्यु] Terrifie, formidable, dreadful, horrible, frightening; बिभ्युर्बिडालेक्षणभीषणाभ्यः <ls>Śi. 3. 45.</ls> --णः {@--1@} The sentiment of terror (in rhetoric); see भयानक, {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--3@} A pigeon, dove. {@--4@} The olibanum tree. --णं {@--1@} Anything that excites terror. {@--2@} Terrifying, causing terror.
